website_summaries.verdict: Parvenu's braid spray can provide cooling relief for too-tight braids.
pros: The T-Tree Braid Spray contains a plethora of natural ingredients, including tea tree oil
It absorbs into hair quickly, making application easy
Some buyers report a pleasant tingling sensation upon applying it
cons: If the tea tree oil is a selling point, this spray doesn't have tons of it

customer_reviews.title: Not bad if you plan to wash your hair soon after
customer_reviews.text: I have box braids and my scalp was very dry and itchy and it was starting to flake. I bought this product and it did stop the itching and my scalp wasn’t so dry anymore but after about a week of using it once or twice a day i have soooooo much buildup it’s honestly disgusting. The spray says you can use up to 4 times a day so i didn’t think it would cause so much buildup so fast. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal!! I use this on my daughters hair and it works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Scalp Oil, Nothing Less, Nothing More
customer_reviews.text: This works as what it says - scalp oil. There are MANY such oils made, and this one does not stand out. I used it once, it moistened my scalp, and that's it. I have nothing more to say.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parnevu T-Tree Growth Creme really works!
customer_reviews.text: Parnevu T-Tree Growth Crème really works! I have used this product before and saw regrowth of hair which was thinning around my hairline.
customer_reviews.author: Marie W.

customer_reviews.title: Rocky Start, but I'm sure it will be a solid finish
customer_reviews.text: The product was open and spilled out into package, about 1/4 of it. Leaving my hands with the oil/grease all over my hands. Besides the mess and spill, I hope it works!! After a few uses I will write another review to show result's. I also use the shampoo and leave-in- conditioner off and on; and love them. Prayer helps with hair- growth too, Amen!!
customer_reviews.author: StarrE.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Extreley thick I couldn't get it just of my scalp without it making all my hair oily
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Lyn McNeeley

customer_reviews.title: Great braids spray
customer_reviews.text: I like how light the product is, it doesn't build up in my hair. I like the scent and the fact that there is tea tree, which helps with my scalp and the itching. I will definitely keep buying this product for my braid/twist styles.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good smell. Doesn't feel super thick or oily. Have seen growth! :)
customer_reviews.author: Bridget D.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It really works. Soothes itching and helped my hair grow. I use daily. Nice size bottle for price.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Best Frizz control - I am live in humidity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I was in New Orleans and it did wonders on my frizz. Spray is after a shower or straight on dry hair for shine too.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy N Francis

customer_reviews.title: Conditions well, but doesn't moisturize
customer_reviews.text: Good strengthening formula, but not very moisturizing, and no sealing. I mist through my hair when I need to reduce breakage, and it works great for that. But I always have to follow up with moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: J McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cream makes the hair soft and beautiful. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Butare-Kiyovu

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I usually never run out of this product, but the pandemic hit and changed things. Happy to be able to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: MsBosslady1823

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beard...
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil. Smells good, helps moisture my beard as well as helps it grow.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Most have got braiding
customer_reviews.text: My only go to for my clients, I love this and the scent is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Sw33ts

customer_reviews.title: Product works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Product works as intended product smell is not malodorous and is soothing to the feel makes ur hair greatly soft and smooth
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Must Haves
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my real hair, and my weaves. I don’t buy synthetic hair but I was told from clients it works just fine on them as well dahhhling.
customer_reviews.author: Fabulous Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great itch relief
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good, and it also really helps stops the itching from your braids. I use this 2x a day once in the morning and once at night, but if your braids itch excessively I recognize using this more often for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brie Riley

customer_reviews.title: Parnevu changed the T-tree growth cream formula?  Please bring back the original version.
customer_reviews.text: Why did Parnevu change the T-tree growth cream formula? It is not even close to the original product and reacts badly in my hair. The product does not even look the same or feel the same. Please bring back the original version. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dellson

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Work great on fine natural hair. It lays down my edges and it’s not very thick or greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Dorma Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair really soft and it tingles the itchy sensation away.
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: If looking for growth, buy this product and be patient
customer_reviews.text: Ensure to condition your hair weekly and the rest will take care of itself. Sleep right, eat right and your hair will be nourished with this. This is on my list as one of the best products, of which I will reorder when low.
customer_reviews.author: Thing 2

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: i liked it but i thought it was creme. thanks for fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: latina

customer_reviews.title: Smells great as well
customer_reviews.text: Controls the itching and leaves my braids feeling soft. Smells great as well !
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: I am yet to see the effect
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, though I am yet to see the effect.
customer_reviews.author: ALONGE BUSOLA JUSTINAH

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: leaves hair smelling great and provides great texture to the hair and the scalp
customer_reviews.author: Maki

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE PRODUCT THAT IS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: This is not Parnevu growth creme. It is Parnevu herbal grow. It’s like a grease instead of cream. False advertisement. It’s the same brand, wrong product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent product. I highly recommend sellerto future
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and came on time. Thank you. Recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Product is messed up
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is all melted and leaking out from the container. Total mess.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette

customer_reviews.title: Parnevu T-Tree Scalp Oil
customer_reviews.text: Great product, when my scalp is itchy this oil really helps. I would recommend this product to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: mcnack90806

customer_reviews.title: It works in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product years ago during my first big chop so decided to use it again because it worked. It has a smooth liquid type of consistency and it isn't heavy on the scalp. Only thing I don't like about it is that it seems to cancel out other products lol if that makes sense. My gels don't have any hold if I apply it the same day and also with other products it seems to form small white clumps so I would recommend you use it on a day that you don't have to style your hair or the night before.
customer_reviews.author: Shan R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair product. It's feels so light on my scalp and doesn't leave my hair clammie.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Hair cream that's just right
customer_reviews.text: Great hair cream , keeps hair shiny and well oiled just well enough not to leave running oily streaks. I would recommend it even for short hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mkokeli Nkomo

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived ahead of schedule, but...
customer_reviews.text: The product was about half empty when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: charlene sims

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: One week into using it, does the cooling. The smell goes away as it dries. I might buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tushar Bharati

customer_reviews.title: Great for my scalp but too much fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil on my scalp when I'm drying my braid out. It does make my scalp less itchy but it has a lot of fragrance. I have to use it sparingly. I'm not going to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Zoopath

customer_reviews.title: T-Tree break control
customer_reviews.text: creams don't seem to work well with my hair. If I had know this was a cream, I would not have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: tagalong

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This cream is light and smells like mint but isn't really greasy like some of the other growth products. It is quickly absorbed into the hair making messes less then likely. I put it in my my sons hair he is 9 months and it had really helped his hair to grow within 2 weeks I saw results. Its makes the hair curly when combed through if you like the appearance of really moist hydrated hair I would not recommend this product. The hair can appear kind of dull as it is a light cream that absorbs quickly but it does grow the hair pretty fast!
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper87

customer_reviews.title: It works very good at making my hair grow
customer_reviews.text: It works very good at making my hair grow . I plain to keep using it also telling my friends about it . And they buying it too
customer_reviews.author: Georgianne  Tyrance

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really help my dry flaky scalp. I'm loving it, will be ordering another soon. The smell isn't overpowering. Just right.
customer_reviews.author: Berry

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Someone recommended this product to me for my kinky twist hairstyle and I have to say that it works better than I had expected! Even though the hair that I have is synthetic this product actually softens the hair so that the twists appear more natural looking and they are definitely more manageable. I love it! And the price was great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Yoruba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I’ll have to buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: great to use!! you guys need to by it, i really love it. It made my hair healthy and smooth!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ariane

customer_reviews.title: Works best on African American hair
customer_reviews.text: It smells like mint. I happen to like mint a lot.this felt my hair feeling cleaner thicker and less frizzy and all other the place
customer_reviews.author: Product queen

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is heaven sent! It really does calm your scalp by giving a cool tingling sensation and I love how you can use it up to 4 times a day. The smell is great, kinda sweet. I wear a lot of braids & protective styles so I love that it comes in a big bottle. I also use this on my natural hair after I wash it when I'm not in a protective style. When you spray on damp hair, it lathers up so I use it as a moisturizer/leave in. You can't beat the price & size for all the benefits you get. This is my holy grail fore sure!,
customer_reviews.author: Curlista93

customer_reviews.title: Love this spray!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I’ve been braiding my own hair for almost 20 years and I use it on my own hair and my clients’ freshly-braided hair. It cools and soothes the scalp. It’s not heavy or oily and doesn’t contribute to build up on your hair. It smells great and can freshen hair that’s been braided for weeks (but it is NOT an alternative to shampooing, folks). I have sensitive skin and have never had an adverse reaction to it.
customer_reviews.author: Siege

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works on my dry scalp and the scent is slso good
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Always a winner
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product on and off for years, it is great for braids and especially the sheen it gives is amazing. The scalp feels refreshed and does not leave build up, tea tree is also great for itching as well as easing the tension on the braids when they are new. A little goes a long way with this spray, it lasts long.
customer_reviews.author: VioAnne

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend This Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I got braids done for the first time and they were super tight leaving bumps and making me so itchy and this product really provided me with some relief!!! its cool and refreshing and really helped ease the pain and itching! Highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Mhrez

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE SCENT
customer_reviews.text: I wear my hair natural and so I decided to give this a try. It works nicely on natural hair. I plan to twist my hair with this but right now I am just wearing it braided. I love all Parnevu products but this T-Tree growth cream is just wonderful and my hair seems to be doing well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Blkgalusa

customer_reviews.title: Hair Creme
customer_reviews.text: So far this creme is working good. Does good for when my scalp itches. I just wish the container was more full when it arrived. But other than that I have no complaints

customer_reviews.title: Something new to try !
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it , I have seen a little growth !!!!

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair/Braid Spray out there
customer_reviews.text: If you wear any style braids. This is the spray you need. The scent is light and refreshing. It also promotes hair growth. And I only use this brand because Its thee best

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good shampoo been using it for a few years now

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray sheen. Adds life and a great smell to my hair.

customer_reviews.title: BEST ALL NATURAL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT NOT ONLY FOR ITS NON GREASY & ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS BUT B/C OF ITS ANGELIC ABILITIES IN MY HAIR! OAN THE SCENT IS GREAT TOO. WHEN USING THIS PRODUCT U CAN "FEEL IT" WORKING. ALSO THE COMPANY I BROUGHT THIS FROM WAS GREAT TOO. DEFINITELY WILL USE THEM AGAIN WHEN USING AMAZON.

customer_reviews.text: This formula works very well on my family's hair, especially when maintaining braiding styles. It was shipped extremely fast.

customer_reviews.text: I love the product this is the first time I use it

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mother and she says she really likes it! I haven't tried it myself, but I think it's a pretty good product and it makes her happy.

customer_reviews.title: Parnevu
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, keeps your scalp from getting dry and always arrives on time

customer_reviews.title: love this product.
customer_reviews.text: makes hair super soft. it's like going to a salon in your own home. this was recommended with the best intentions. double As=affordable and awesome product.

customer_reviews.title: I love Parnevu!!
customer_reviews.text: This is about my second week using this shampoo, for the second time around tho! Use to buy all the time when I lived in Chicago but then moved and could never find it! So happy to see it on Amazon this is a wonderful mild shampoo that always had my hair shinny and hydrated!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the holy grail for if you have a itchy scalp. I wash my hair and condition it, and before I style it and put a bit on my scalp and rub it in! That's it! Perfect.

WHEN USING THIS PRODUCT U CAN "FEEL IT" WORKING. ALSO THE COMPANY I BROUGHT THIS FROM WAS GREAT TOO. DEFINITELY WILL USE THEM AGAIN WHEN USING AMAZON.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Stimulated new growth and made my hair stronger. Not a bad smell either.

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff !!! However the company knows I love it so they raised the price outrageously. I won't be purchasing anymore; the stuff is just too expensive !!!

customer_reviews.title: great for the hair ....awesome of dreadlocks
customer_reviews.text: Best ever to stop itching and awesome for dreadlocks. Best for dry brittle hair. Outstanding on African American hair. Great price on this items and great smell for the product.

customer_reviews.title: Great For Itching
customer_reviews.text: love this hair oil. Great for the itchy scalp! I bought two bottles just in case..☺ Highly recommend it.Great for my hair

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: If you have skin problems (psorasis, dandruff etc..) this product is very good try it you'll see!!!!! You will not regret it!!!

customer_reviews.title: and smells great! NOT to heavy on hair
customer_reviews.text: Goes on shiny, hydrates, and smells great! NOT to heavy on hair.

customer_reviews.title: No change in my hair
customer_reviews.text: Didnt see a difference. Made my hair feel gross. Waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Too liquidy. Item was not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Item left my hair feeling wet and because my hair is natural, I had some shrinkage. I thought it would be more creamy.

product_meta.title: Parnevu T-Tree Braid Spray, 12 Ounce
